IndexNode_622.name: vectorDB
IndexNode_622.label: Vector DB
IndexNode_622.description: Select the vector database where the vectors will be indexed.

triggerNode_1.name: credentials
triggerNode_1.label: Credentials
triggerNode_1.description: Select the credentials for Onedrive authentication.

triggerNode_1.name: drive_name
triggerNode_1.label: Drive Name
triggerNode_1.description: Name of the Microsoft OneDrive drive where the file(s) exist. For most accounts, this is "OneDrive".

triggerNode_1.name: folder_path
triggerNode_1.label: Folder Path
triggerNode_1.description: Path to a specific folder within the drives to search for files. Leave "." to search all folders of the drives. This does not apply to shared items. For a folder absolute path, use the format "./FolderName/SubfolderName"

vectorizeNode_639.name: embeddingModelName
vectorizeNode_639.label: Embedding Model Name
vectorizeNode_639.description: Select the model to convert the texts into vector representations.
